description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Explore a big open world in this crazy Role Playing Platformer! Play with 3 different characters, drive a car, a bike, a boat or even a spaceship, buy equipment to get new abilities, travel through more than 100 levels and most of all discover a definitively crazy story! Now updated!  "Brilliant graphics, sound and storyline, this really is a very solid game." IndieGo #3
